content: As many of you of you have pointed out, fhir.org is currently broken. The problem appears to be in the Apache server, and the server it is running run gives us no access to restart Apache (presumably it's shared...). I've been unable to get any support on the server, so @David Johnson (HL7 webmaster) and I are currently moving it off the shared host to a dedicated server that we manage completely. Hopefully we'll get this done today
yay - after a big long saga, @David Johnson has got fhir.org running again - thanks very much
